Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.abilities.decorators

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAdditionalBuild
    Abstract class for the decorators that allow an additional built
    AbstractForceMove
    Abstract class for the decorators that allow a force move
    AdditionalBuildNotOnPerimeter
    Decorator that allows an additional built but not on the board perimeter
    AdditionalBuildOnDifferentCell
    Decorator that allows an additional built on a different cell
    AdditionalBuildOnSameCell
    Decorator that allows an additional built on the same cell
    AdditionalMove
    Decorator that allows an additional move
    BlockMoveHigherWorker
    Decorator that blocks an the opponent highest worker
    BlockMoveUpAfterBuild
    Decorator that blocks the move action on an higher level after a built
    BlockOnPlayerMoveUp
    Decorator that blocks an opponent movement on an higher level
    BuildBeforeMove
    Decorator that allows to build before a move action
    BuildBelow
    Decorator that allows to build on the cell where the worker is present
    BuildDomeOnAnyLevel
    Decorator that allows to built a dome on any level
    ForcePushMove
    Decorator that allows a force move pushing the forced worker in another cell
    ForceSwapMove
    Decorator that allows a swap betwenn the player worker and the forced worker
    NoWinOnPerimeter
    Decorator that forbids the player's win if his winning worker is on a perimeter cell
    ParkourCross
    Decorator that allows to force a neighboring opponent worker to the space directly on the other side of the player's worker, if that space is unoccupied
    WinOnDeltaLevel
    Decorator that allows the victory on a certain difference between levels
